overview: Three provincial girls departed for Beijing. Yu Quin works as a hostess in a night-club, leaving her two-year-old daughter in someone else's care. Hu Jin is a bit part player and runway model. Zun Ji worked as a dancer in a discotheque, but returned to her hometown after she became a drug addict.

production_companies.name: Centre du Cinéma et de l'Audiovisuel de la FWB

title: Neon Goddesses
